amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to eliminate funding for the ARPA-E program as recommended by the administration.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for the ARPA-E program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 295 (Roll no. 246).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 295 (Roll no. 246).
